content.text: The CrossAsia Open Access Repository is a disciplinary repository for Asian Studies. It is the central publication hub of the Specialised Information Service Asia (Fachinformationsdienst Asien) established at the Staatsbibliothek zu Berlin (Berlin State Library). Its goal is to provide open, free-of-cost and long-term access to quality scholarly material from all fields of social sciences, cultural studies and humanities related to Asia. This includes original and secondary publications, research data, blog posts, audio, video, and image material.

metadataPolicy.text: All bibliographic metadata provided via this interface, except abstracts, is hereby made available under CC0 license, free to share and re-use.

dataPolicy.text: The publications and electronic documents provided here must be used according to copyright laws, all rights reserved if not otherwise explicitly specified.

submissionPolicy.text: The repository is open to all researchers who want to publish Open Access materials in Asian Studies, or Asia related content from other disciplines. It especially welcomes contributions from universities and other institutions in Asian Studies.
